articles.title: Viral video: Woman dances to Shah Rukh Khan-Deepika Padukone song at airport; netizens ask Instagram to 'ban such reels' | Today News - Mint
articles.description: Internet users express disapproval towards public dancing stunts in reels as a woman influencer faces backlash for dancing at Kolkata airport to Bollywood music.
articles.content: Dancing at public places is among the few reel stunts that the internet users aren't really a fan of. Despite such dance videos being met with harsh criticism online, a similar video is going viral l… [+1656 chars]
